name: Simple Twitter
author: Chris "Chris CB" CUSSAT-BLANC

sections.description: Simple Twitter is a simple plugins that allows you to add a fading in and out box displaying somebody’s twitts. It has to be added to your theme with a simple line of code.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip ‘wp-ccbSimpleTwitter.zip’ on your computer.
  2. Upload the directory ‘wp-ccbSimpleTwitter’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
    on your web server
